description: Care Everywhere Organization patient authorization related items.

columns.name: AUTH_SCAN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Scan status for a Care Everywhere authorization form


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Incomplete


Complete - Scanned


Not Scanned


Complete - E-Signed


Complete - External Auth


Complete - MyChart

columns.name: AUTH_NO_SCAN_REASON
columns.description: This item specifies the reason why a user did not attach a scan to a Care Everywhere authorization

columns.name: SIGNED_COLL_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who last set the authorization status to 'signed'

columns.name: SIGNED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant a signed authorization was received
